results.description: Subtract analyst mean estimate from actual announced EPS. Applied SUGGESTION1 (used two fields est_eps and anl4_afv4_actual). SUGGESTION3 not needed (both coverage >0.7). SUGGESTION4 considered: both fields have high userCount so signal is robust. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed (<=2 datafields, few operators). Confidence set to 0.78 because earnings surprises historically profitable.

Actual sales minus estimated sales, cross-sectionally normalized. Used est_sales and sales_estimate_value (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high so ts_backfill not applied. Preference given to high userCount fields (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.72 given moderate historical edge.

Use number of upper estimations (anl4_ady_pu) as a proxy for upward revisions; long stocks with rising counts. SUGGESTION1 used single strong field; SUGGESTION4 applied (high userCount). No ts_backfill needed (coverage 0.7196). Confidence 0.6 since revisions sometimes noisy.

Stocks with large analyst dispersion in sales estimates may be uncertain; short high dispersion. SUGGESTION1 used sales_estimate_stddev_quarterly. Coverage >0.6 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 limited userCount but signal interpretable. Confidence 0.55.
Actual announced EBIT minus mean estimate (anl4_ebit_value - anl4_ebit_mean). Applied SUGGESTION1; both fields have solid coverage and userCount (SUGGESTION4). No ts_backfill. Confidence 0.7.
Standardize EBITDA surprise using mean and std of estimates. Used anl4_ebitda_value and anl4_ebitda_mean (SUGGESTION1 & 4). Coverage high; no backfill. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: EPS surprise scaled by estimate count
results.description: Earnings surprise scaled by number of EPS estimates to prefer well-covered stocks. Used anl4_afv4_actual, est_eps and earnings_per_share_estimate_count. To keep <=2 fields, approximate scale by dividing surprise by count proxy est_eps (SUGGESTION1). Chose not to use third field to satisfy KEEP_IN_MIND2. Confidence 0.62.
Relative surprise = (actual - estimate) / estimate. Uses est_eps and anl4_afv4_actual (SUGGESTION1 & 4). No backfill needed. Confidence 0.74.
ts_delta of mean EPS estimates over 30 days to capture accelerating upgrades. SUGGESTION3: coverage good so ts_backfill not applied. Used est_eps and ts_delta (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.58.
Time-series zscore of est_sales to detect persistent revision trends. Applied ts_zscore(est_sales,30). SUGGESTION4: est_sales has reasonable userCount. Confidence 0.56.

Average of last 4 quarter surprises: vec_avg-like idea but use ts_mean over 90 days of (actual-estimate). SUGGESTION2 not applied (no clear vector field). Used anl4_afv4_actual and est_eps with ts_mean. Confidence 0.65.
Favor stocks with many estimates (earnings_per_share_estimate_count high) as higher-quality signals. SUGGESTION4 applied. Field has coverage 1.0 so robust. Confidence 0.5 (simple quality filter).
Stocks with low std of EPS estimates (anl4_qf_az_dts_spe) indicate analyst consensus; long low std. SUGGESTION1 used single dispersion field. Coverage moderate; no ts_backfill. Confidence 0.52.
Announced cash flow from operations minus average estimate (anl4_cfo_value - anl4_cfo_median). Used two fields per SUGGESTION1; both have good coverage. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share surprise
results.description: Compare announced free cash flow per share vs mean estimate (free_cash_flow_per_share_actual_value vs anl4_fcf_mean). Coverage low for some fields; applied ts_backfill if missing (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.59.
Stocks with many lower estimations (anl4_ady_down or basiccon down) may be deteriorating; short high counts. Used anl4_ady_down. SUGGESTION4: field has moderate userCount. Confidence 0.51.

Change in guidance_value_currency_code detail not numeric; instead use guidance_value (when numeric) delta to detect upward guidance revisions. Because many guidance fields have low coverage, apply ts_backfill when coverage <0.6 (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.49.
Decrease in 'hold' and increase in 'buy' signals (use anl4_hold reverse). Using single field anl4_hold as proxy. SUGGESTION4: high userCount. Confidence 0.46.
Announced net profit minus net profit mean estimate (anl4_netprofit_value vs anl4_netprofit_mean). SUGGESTION1 & 4 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Announced pretax income minus mean estimate (anl4_ptp_value - est_ptp). Both fields have strong coverage; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.64.

Lower-than-expected SGA is positive: subtract actual reported from est_sga and zscore. Used est_sga and selling_general_admin_expense_reported_value. Coverage moderate; use ts_backfill if necessary (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.48.

If reported R&D < mean estimate, margin upside. Use research_development_expense_actual_value and anl4_rd_exp_mean. Coverage low for some fields so ts_backfill applied when needed (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: High forecast upgrades with low dispersion
results.description: Combine anl4_ady_pu (up counts) and low anl4_afv4_eps_std (dispersion) via subtract and zscore. SUGGESTION1 used multiple fields but KEEP_IN_MIND2: two fields only. SUGGESTION4 favored high userCount for anl4_ady_pu. Confidence 0.63.
Compare est_eps growth relative to est_tot_assets (est_eps / est_tot_assets) to find EPS efficient growers. SUGGESTION1 used two fields, both with decent coverage. Confidence 0.45.

Actual cashflow per share minus cashflow_per_share_average (or estimate). Use anl4_qfv4_actual and cashflow_per_share_average. Coverage high for actuals; ts_backfill if average missing. Confidence 0.58.
Increase in book value per share estimate (anl4_bvps_mean ts_delta). SUGGESTION3 not needed if coverage high. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: High forecasted EBITDA relative to peers
results.description: Use anl4_ebitda_mean and cross-sectional zscore to capture strong expected EBITDA. SUGGESTION4 applied (userCount>1k). Confidence 0.5.

EPS surprise divided by std of EPS estimates to favor confident beats. Used anl4_afv4_actual, est_eps, anl4_qf_az_dts_spe but KEEP_IN_MIND restricts to 2 fields, so approximate by dividing surprise by anl4_qf_az_dts_spe. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.67.
ts_delta of est_eps over 60 days to capture consistent analyst upgrades. SUGGESTION3: est_eps coverage high so no backfill. Confidence 0.54.
Use anl4_mark (recommendation consensus score) high values imply buys; zscore it. SUGGESTION4 applied (good userCount). Confidence 0.47.

Compare max_adjusted_eps_guidance (guidance) vs previous guidance (if available). Many guidance fields have full coverage; used max_adjusted_eps_guidance and max_adjusted_eps_guidance_2 where applicable. Simpler: use max_adjusted_eps_guidance as signal. Confidence 0.43.
Rising anl4_basicconafv110_down (number of lower estimations) signals downgrades; short when high. Used single field per SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.49.
Compare est_cashflow_op to est_capex to find cash-generative firms: divide(est_cashflow_op, est_capex). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Coverage moderate; ts_backfill if needed. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Earnings quality: adjusted vs GAAP gap
results.description: Difference between est_epsa (adjusted) and est_eps (GAAP) indicates adjustments. Use subtract(est_epsa, est_eps). est_epsa coverage lower; applied ts_backfill when missing. SUGGESTION4 considered. Confidence 0.46.
Announced gross income minus anl4_gric_mean. Used anl4_gric_value and anl4_gric_mean. Coverage good; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.57.
Operating profit (EBIT) actual vs mean estimate (anl4_ebit_value - anl4_ebit_mean). SUGGESTION1 used two strong fields. Confidence 0.65.
ts_zscore of est_ptp to capture improving pretax income expectations. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.42.
Announced adjusted net income (anl4_netprofita_value) minus mean (anl4_netprofita_mean). Fields have high userCount; applied SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.6.

Lower-than-expected stock option expense improves margins: subtract actual from max guidance when relevant. Many guidance fields have full coverage; simplified to reverse zscore(stock_option_expense_max_guidance_qtr). Confidence 0.35.

results.idea: Large change in number of estimates
results.description: ts_delta of anl4_afv4_cfps_number (number of cashflow estimates) as a signal of analyst attention. Use ts_delta and ts_zscore. Confidence 0.38.

Decrease in est_netdebt via negative ts_delta signals improving balance sheet; use ts_zscore(ts_delta(est_netdebt,60)). SUGGESTION3: est_netdebt coverage moderate; backfill if needed. Confidence 0.41.
ts_delta of est_sales captures acceleration in revenue expectations. est_sales has good userCount; no backfill. Confidence 0.6.
Use anl4_mark (consensus) minus anl4_hold as a simple sentiment spread. Two fields only and both have coverage >0.6. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Large revision with low coverage filter
results.description: Use est_eps ts_delta but filter out low estimate-count stocks via earnings_per_share_estimate_count (but KEEP_IN_MIND2 limits fields). Instead compute delta and trust high-count coverage (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: High reported cashflow vs financing outflow
results.description: Compare cfo to cff (cashflow ops vs financing) via divide to find net operational strength. Used anl4_cfo_value and cash_flow_from_financing. Coverage moderate; ts_backfill if missing. Confidence 0.47.
Compare max_adjusted_eps_guidance to est_eps to detect optimistic guidance relative to current street. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.45.
Announced adjusted funds from operations vs guidance (max_adjusted_funds_from_operations_guidance). Use single high-coverage guidance field as signal. Confidence 0.4.
ts_delta of anl4_total_rec (total recommendations) captures shifting analyst attention; used ts_delta and ts_zscore. Coverage decent. Confidence 0.37.

results.idea: EPS surprise normalized by total assets
results.description: Scale EPS surprise by est_tot_assets to favor asset-light beaters: divide(actual-estimate, est_tot_assets). Used two fields. Confidence 0.39.
Use anl4_eaz2lrec_ratingvalue (rating score) zscored; SUGGESTION4: high userCount. Confidence 0.48.
ts_delta of anl4_epsr_std or related std fields to detect rising analyst consensus; used ts_delta on anl4_qf_az_dts_spe. Coverage moderate. Confidence 0.43.
Use anl4_eaz2lrec_person or similar broker score; instead use anl4_baz1v110_estvalue as estimation proxy. SUGGESTION4: chosen fields with good userCount. Confidence 0.3.
Compare current surprise to previous quarter via ts_delta on (actual-estimate). Implemented with ts_delta on est_eps difference. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.55.
ts_count_nans not applicable; instead use ts_delta of anl4_totassets_number or anl4_cfo_number to detect spikes in estimates volume. Chose anl4_totassets_number. Confidence 0.33.
Combine low std (anl4_qf_az_dts_spe) and positive surprise; KEEP_IN_MIND limits fields to 2 so divide surprise by std. SUGGESTION4 considered. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: High estimated sales growth vs peers
results.description: Use est_sales zscored cross-sectionally to find fast-growing revenue expectations. SUGGESTION4: est_sales userCount good. Confidence 0.5.

Use operating_profit_before_depr_amort actual vs guidance mean (operating_profit_before_depr_amort_max_guidance_qtr) where available. If guidance missing, use ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: High number of upper estimations normalized
results.description: Normalize anl4_ady_pu across cross-section using quantile to reduce outliers (SUGGESTION1+4). Confidence 0.53.
Compare anl4_fcf_mean to announced anl4_fcf_median or actual; use subtract and zscore. Some fcf fields low coverage -> ts_backfill applied per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.57.
ts_delta of anl4_ebit_std to detect falling uncertainty; used ts_zscore(ts_delta(...)). SUGGESTION4: field userCount moderate. Confidence 0.4.
anl4_ebitda_value minus anl4_ebitda_mean zscored. Both have decent coverage; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Use anl4_af_eps_value (actual EPS) zscored cross-sectionally to capture strong reported EPS. Field coverage very high. Confidence 0.62.
SUGGESTION2: identify vector-like field for per-day estimates not available; instead use anl4_qf_az_eps (std) reverse to prefer stable names. Used reverse(zscore(...)). Confidence 0.36.
Decrease in cash flow from financing (less outflow) implies deleveraging; ts_delta on cash_flow_from_financing. Use ts_zscore. Confidence 0.34.
ts_zscore of anl4_ebitda_mean to detect rising EBITDA expectations. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.49.
Difference between highest and lowest sales estimates (if available). Use sales_estimate_stddev_quarterly as proxy for divergence. Confidence 0.41.
anl4_netprofit_value scaled by est_tot_assets to find efficient profit generators: divide(netprofit, est_tot_assets). Two fields respected. Confidence 0.38.
Use anl4_ptp_value zscored cross-sectionally. Coverage high and userCount strong (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.6.
Difference between max_reported_pretax_income_guidance and est_ptp as a signal of management optimism. Used two fields; coverage OK. Confidence 0.4.
Actual revenue (sales_estimate_value when available) minus est_sales standardized. SUGGESTION3: sales_estimate_value coverage high so no backfill. Confidence 0.63.
ts_delta of anl4_cfo_value to capture improving operations. SUGGESTION4: field widely used. Confidence 0.47.
Low ts_std_dev of earnings_per_share_estimate_count indicates stable analyst coverage; reverse zscore low std. Used ts_std_dev. Confidence 0.28.
Compare anl4_afv4_actual to anl4_dez1qfv4_preest (previous estimate) if available; many previous fields low coverage so apply ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.53.

Use forecast-type flags (anl4_ptp_flag) changes to detect revisions; ts_step or ts_delta of flag used. Flags are categorical; use ts_delta count of changes with ts_count_nans not ideal. Simpler: use days_from_last_change(anl4_ptp_flag). Confidence 0.2.
zscore of anl4_netprofita_value (announced adjusted net income). SUGGESTION4: high userCount supports signal. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: High announced EBITDA to EV proxy
results.description: Use anl4_ebitda_value scaled by est_tot_assets as proxy for profitability per capital. Two fields used. Confidence 0.36.
Use anl4_basicconafv110_mean as signal of broker consensus mean. SUGGESTION4: userCount moderate. Confidence 0.3.
sales_estimate_median_value vs est_sales difference zscored. Both coverage high for quarterly proxies; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Divide anl4_cfo_value by anl4_cfo_median std proxy to favor confident cashflow names. KEEP_IN_MIND two fields used. Confidence 0.52.
ts_delta of anl4_ebitda_mean over 90 days to detect upgrades. SUGGESTION4: field robust. Confidence 0.48.

Combine high mean est (anl4_afv4_cfps_mean) with low std (anl4_afv4_cfps_median) but KEEP_IN_MIND restricts to two fields; instead use reverse zscore of anl4_afv4_cfps_low to prefer names with low lows. Confidence 0.27.

results.idea: Large change in estimated total assets
results.description: ts_delta of est_tot_assets to find balance-sheet related revisions. est_tot_assets has decent coverage. Confidence 0.33.

results.idea: Earnings surprise scaled by asset size
results.description: Divide EPS surprise by est_tot_assets to find efficient beaters. Two fields only used. Confidence 0.41.
ts_delta of anl4_total_rec to find rising analyst interest; use ts_zscore. Confidence 0.29.
book_value_per_share_reported_value minus est_bookvalue_ps zscored. Use two fields. Coverage moderate; ts_backfill if needed. Confidence 0.34.
est_ffo is low coverage; if available use est_ffo actual vs mean. Due to low coverage apply ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3) and treat as lower confidence. Confidence 0.25.
Use anl4_qfv4_actual (announced cashflow per share) zscored for strong cash generation names. Field coverage very high. Confidence 0.56.
Compare anl4_tbvps_high or annl4_tbvps_mean to est_tbv_ps; many tbv fields low coverage so apply ts_backfill when missing (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.3.

results.idea: High reported operating profit vs estimate
results.description: operating_profit_before_interest_tax actual vs operating_profit_before_depr_amort mean guidance. Use subtract and zscore. Coverage high for actuals. Confidence 0.58.
Count of recent announced financials (ts_count_nans on anl4_fsactualafv4_actual inverted) to detect active reporters; SUGGESTION3 not applied. Confidence 0.22.
Reverse zscore of anl4_netprofit_std to prefer low disagreement names. SUGGESTION4 considered userCount moderate. Confidence 0.46.
Use anl4_bac1detailqfv110_estvalue or anl4_bac1detailafv110_estvalue as broker consensus buys; selected field anl4_bac1detailafv110_estvalue. Confidence 0.28.
Winsorize EPS surprise to reduce outliers then zscore: winsorize(subtract(actual, estimate)). Used SUGGESTION1 and KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: High reported net income vs estimate
results.description: net_income_adjusted minus anl4_netprofita_mean zscored. net_income_adjusted has high coverage and userCount. Confidence 0.59.
High ts_std_dev of guidance fields implies management uncertainty; use ts_std_dev(max_adjusted_eps_guidance, 180). SUGGESTION3: guidance coverage high. Confidence 0.24.
pretax_income_reported_value minus max_reported_pretax_income_guidance zscored. Use two fields; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.45.
ts_delta of cashflow_per_share_average to capture growing cash per share. Use ts_zscore. Confidence 0.39.

results.idea: High announced adjusted net income momentum
results.description: ts_delta of anl4_netprofita_value to detect improving adjusted profits. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.44.
Compare max_adjusted_eps_guidance to previous guidance where prev field exists; use ts_backfill to ensure prev value (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.41.
ts_delta of earnings_per_share_estimate_count to detect increasing analyst coverage; use ts_zscore. Confidence 0.35.

results.idea: High reported funds from operations surprise
results.description: announced funds from operations vs guidance mean (funds_from_operations_max_guidance) where available. Many guidance fields full coverage -> used directly. Confidence 0.3.
Scale est_sales by est_tot_assets to find revenue efficiency: divide(est_sales, est_tot_assets). Two fields only. Confidence 0.37.
Divide anl4_cff_value by anl4_cfo_value to find financing reliance; reverse for preference to operational cash. Two fields used. Confidence 0.33.
ts_delta of anl4_mark to detect quick consensus moves; ts_zscore applied. Confidence 0.29.
Subtract reported EPS from adjusted EPS (est_epsa - est_eps) to detect quality; ts_backfill if est_epsa sparse (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.31.
ts_delta of dividend_estimate_median_value to detect improved payout expectations; coverage moderate so ts_backfill when needed. Confidence 0.26.

results.idea: High announced operating cashflow vs guidance
results.description: operating_cashflow_reported_value minus cash_flow_operations_min_guidance zscored. Guidance fields full coverage used. Confidence 0.4.
Long low sales_estimate_stddev_quarterly, short high std; quantile used to form cross-section. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.34.

results.idea: High reported adjusted FCF per share
results.description: free_cash_flow_per_share_reported_value zscored (where available). Coverage low so ts_backfill employed (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.28.

results.idea: High analyst optimism relative to peers
results.description: zscore of anl4_bvps_mean (book value per share mean) to detect optimistic analyst book estimates. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.25.
ts_zscore of anl4_qfv4_eps_mean over 120 days to detect rising quarterly EPS expectations. Field coverage high; no backfill. Confidence 0.5.
max_share_buyback_guidance zscored as proxy for capital return policy strength. Guidance coverage full where present. Confidence 0.27.
Divide anl4_ebitda_mean by est_tot_assets to find EBITDA intensity. Two fields used. Confidence 0.32.

results.idea: High decrease in analyst lower counts
results.description: Reverse ts_delta of anl4_basicconafv110_down to find falling pessimism. SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.28.

results.idea: High reported gross income vs estimate
results.description: anl4_gric_value minus anl4_gric_mean zscored. Both fields have good coverage; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.54.
Use group of ts_delta on multiple estimate counts would be ideal but KEEP_IN_MIND2 restricts to one field; use ts_delta(anl4_basicconqfv110_numest) as proxy for clustering. Confidence 0.22.

results.idea: High adjusted net profit surprise scaled
results.description: Subtract anl4_netprofita_mean from anl4_netprofita_value and scale by est_tot_assets to favor efficient profitability. Two fields used. Confidence 0.39.

Reverse zscore of max_adjusted_eps_guidance (low guidance) combined with positive est_eps surprise would be ideal; limited to single field so use reverse zscore of guidance to target underappreciated names. Confidence 0.2.
